alert.note: Alert for Franklin; Warren (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Saint Louis (Eastern Missouri and West Central Illinois)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 06 at 10:36AM CDT until May 09 at 7:45AM CDT by NWS Saint Louis
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Missouri... Missouri River at Hermann. ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Missouri... Missouri River at St. Charles. Missouri River at Washington. Missouri River near Chamois. River forecasts are based on observed precipitation and forecast precipitation for the next 24 hours. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL MONDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Missouri River at Washington. * WHEN...Until Monday morning. * IMPACTS...At 21.0 feet, Wastewater plant turns pumps on. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:45 AM CDT Friday the stage was 21.8 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 9:45 AM CDT Friday was 21.8 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage tomorrow evening and continue falling to 14.7 feet Wednesday morning. - Flood stage is 20.0 feet. && Fld Observed Forecasts (1 pm CDT) Location Stg Stg 1 pm Sat Sun Mon Tue Wed Missouri River Washington 20.0 21.8 20.8 18.2 17.9 16.7 MSG &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. This product, along with additional weather and stream information, is available at https://water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=lsx.
